mapper.insert: insert into pc_provider (PROVIDER_ID, PROVIDER_NAME, PROVIDER_SHORT_NAME, PROVIDER_CODE, PROVIDER_PIC_URL, PROVIDER_DESC, PROVIDER_POINT_RATIO, PROVIDER_POINT_FEE, BALANCE_TERM, BALANCE_TYPE, BPROVIDER_LICENSE, BPROVIDER_CONTRACT, PROV_ID, CITY_ID, REGION_ID, PROVIDER_ADDRESS, CUSTSRV_PHONE, CONTACT_NAME, CONTACT_PHONE, CONTACT_PHONE2, CONTACT_EMAIL, PROVIDER_REMARK, PROVIDER_PHONE, PROVIDER_WEBURL, PROVIDER_STATUS, DATA_STATE, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, MODIFYER, MODIFY_TIME ) values (#{providerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{providerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{providerShortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{providerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{providerPicUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{providerDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{providerPointRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{providerPointFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{balanceTerm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{balanceType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bproviderLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bproviderContract,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cityId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{providerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custsrvPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactPhone2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{providerRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{providerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{providerWeburl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{providerStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dataState,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creator,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyer,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update:
update pc_provider
PROVIDER_ID = #{providerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROVIDER_NAME = #{providerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVIDER_SHORT_NAME = #{providerShortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVIDER_CODE = #{providerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVIDER_PIC_URL = #{providerPicUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVIDER_DESC = #{providerDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVIDER_POINT_RATIO = #{providerPointRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROVIDER_POINT_FEE = #{providerPointFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BALANCE_TERM = #{balanceTerm,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BALANCE_TYPE = #{balanceType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BPROVIDER_LICENSE = #{bproviderLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BPROVIDER_CONTRACT = #{bproviderContract,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROV_ID = #{provId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REGION_ID = #{regionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROVIDER_ADDRESS = #{providerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTSRV_PHONE = #{custsrvPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_NAME = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_PHONE = #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_PHONE2 = #{contactPhone2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_EMAIL = #{contactEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVIDER_REMARK = #{providerRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVIDER_PHONE = #{providerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVIDER_WEBURL = #{providerWeburl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVIDER_STATUS = #{providerStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DATA_STATE = #{dataState,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFYER = #{modifyer,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DATA_STATE = 1
and PROVIDER_ID = #{providerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
and PROVIDER_NAME = #{providerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REGION_ID = #{regionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROVIDER_ADDRESS = #{providerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTSRV_PHONE = #{custsrvPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_NAME = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_PHONE = #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_PHONE2 = #{contactPhone2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_EMAIL = #{contactEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVIDER_REMARK = #{providerRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVIDER_PHONE = #{providerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVIDER_WEBURL = #{providerWeburl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVIDER_STATUS = #{providerStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

where PROVIDER_ID = #{providerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select PROVIDER_ID, PROVIDER_NAME, PROVIDER_SHORT_NAME, PROVIDER_CODE, PROVIDER_PIC_URL, PROVIDER_DESC, PROVIDER_POINT_RATIO, PROVIDER_POINT_FEE, BALANCE_TERM, BALANCE_TYPE, BPROVIDER_LICENSE, BPROVIDER_CONTRACT, PROV_ID, CITY_ID, REGION_ID, PROVIDER_ADDRESS, CUSTSRV_PHONE, CONTACT_NAME, CONTACT_PHONE, CONTACT_PHONE2, CONTACT_EMAIL, PROVIDER_REMARK, PROVIDER_PHONE, PROVIDER_WEBURL, PROVIDER_STATUS, DATA_STATE, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, MODIFYER, MODIFY_TIME from pc_provider where PROVIDER_ID = #{providerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

mapper.select: SELECT ad.`AREA_ID` 'areaId', ad.`AREA_NAME` 'areaName' FROM area_def ad WHERE ad.`AREA_LEVEL` = 2
SELECT ad.`AREA_ID` 'areaId', ad.`AREA_NAME` 'areaName' FROM area_def ad WHERE ad.`AREA_LEVEL` = 3 AND ad.`SUP_AREA_ID`=#{provId}
SELECT ad.`AREA_ID` 'areaId', ad.`AREA_NAME` 'areaName' FROM area_def ad WHERE ad.`AREA_LEVEL` = 4 AND ad.`SUP_AREA_ID`=#{cityId}
